Free Gift #4: Ford Transit Van and Ford Escort 1800 Monte Carlo Rally 1979 H. Mikkola/A. Hertz

This is one (and the only one I have) of the 4 free gifts you would receive with your Rally Car Collection subscription. The other 3 are:
- Mini Cooper S T. Mäkinen/P. Easter print
- Subaru Impreza P. Solberg/P. Mills print
- Mini Cooper S Monte Carlo 1964 T. Mäkinen/P. Easter diorama

I don't know much about the van, but as for the car this is the car driven by Hannu Mikkola and Arne Hertz in the 1979 Monte Carlo rally. They finished 5th with a time of 8h 23m 7s, 9m 29s behind the winning Lancia Stratos of Bernard Darnice/Alain Mahé. Mikkola went on to finish 2nd overall in the 1979 season.
